title: Crypto Feels Stuck! Cycle Dead or ETH $10K next? 2 Pros Explain

chunks.text: Ethereum is absolutely mispriced. So, I can't wait to go ahead and see it at $10,000 bare minimum is dead. We go to a 9 to12 trillion market cap and that's being conservative. Retail was here where what if also retail isn't really going to come through anymore? What if they already came in 2021? Leverage. Leverage, man. I'm I'm very deathly afraid of leverage. All right, this episode is for anyone trying to figure out what the next 6 12 months actually looks like in crypto without getting chopped in the noise because the market is sending mixed signals. You've got institutions positioning. You've got regulation as a potential catalyst and yet retail is still a question mark. So today I'm joined by David Gstein, crypto media founder and host of the breakdown with 812,000 followers on X, one of the best in the game at reading sentiment narratives and how policy hits the tape. And we've got Keith D, a former licensed investment broker and former adviser at Security Token Group who built 173,000 YouTube subscribers in 6 months, putting out macro frameworks that actually translate into crypto positioning. In this conversation, we cover three things. The clearest tells that liquidity is actually shifting. Whether the old cycle model is broken or just evolving and what happens if retail comes roaring back or if it doesn't. And the part you do not want to miss. Both of them zero in on this same danger, leverage. and why it's the fastest way to get white even in a bull market. Remember, nothing in this video is financial advice. So, uh you know, the conversations about Ethereum is not going to do anything. It's going to stay at its current price point or even go further down. I I think um is absolutely mispriced.
